name: Bugsmasher
description:
You awake to find yourself smaller than usual. Like, WAY smaller. Not much you can do about it now. Time to fulfill your destiny and smash some bugs, if you catch my drift.

-------------------------------------------------------------

For ##mashupgamejam | Inspired by Helltaker, survive waves of insects and vie for affection at the end of each level to acquire a new cold-hearted beauty to the harem.

How To Play:

[w][s] or Up/Down arrow keys to move

[Space] to use bug spray, careful, you are limited

Music:

  • Vitality Remix - SayMaxWell
  • Persona 4 OST - New Days

Art by me :3

-------------------------------------------------------------

Ant Queen Ariko

Bee Queen Beaya

Tammy The Termite

-------------------------------------------------------------

Go Forth and Conquer those Invertebrates!!!
